lead_paragraph: A state official wants to spend nearly $4 million in search of the plant, which is said to grow in the Himalayas and which a Hindu epic claims has the power to revive the dying.

headline.print_headline: A Hunt for an Herb of Indian Myths
headline.main: Medicinal Herb or Myth? Indian Official Proposes Hunt for Sanjivani of Lore

snippet: A state official wants to spend nearly $4 million in search of the plant, which is said to grow in the Himalayas and which a Hindu epic claims has the power to revive the dying....
abstract: What in the World column; provincial Indian official Mayaram Uniyal seeks financing to search for Sanjivani, medicinal herb to which Hindu mythology ascribes power of reviving dead people; reported sightings of plant resembling sacred herb have provoked excitement in country where holistic medicine is widely practiced.
